application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of condition 28 (residential and commercial Travel Plan) pursuant to planning permission 161144FUL dated 14/02/20217 for demoltion of all existing buildings and the redevelopment of the site to provide a double storey basement with four buildings of 2, 9, 11,32 and 42 storeys comprising 578 residential flats (Use class C3) (mix of 1 bed, 2 bed and 3 bed flats) and 3179sqm (GIA) of flexible use class A1 and/or A2 and/or A3 and/or A4 and/orB 1 and/or D1 and/or D2 floorspace, landscaped east-to-west public route between Victoria Roa dna Poral Way, together with associated amanity and play space, roof gardens, cycle parking, car parking, servicing, public realm improvements, landscaping and infrastruture works, (full planing applicaiton accompanied by an Environmental impact assessment)
